title.rendered: Boot Camp for Closing More Business

content.rendered:
Have you been wanting to “reboot” your business for success? Many of us at Market Leader have attended the past few Inman Agent Reboot events around the country, and found them full of energetic dialog and powerful ideas.

We’re looking forward to attending the next two: Portland, OR, on Wednesday, September 22 and Houston on Tuesday, September 28. Will we see you there?

The Reboots are all about showing techniques and technology for marketing your business, including social media, online advertising, lead generation through your own website, mobile and more.

If you aren’t going to be able to attend the Portland or Houston events, you can keep up with what’s going on by watching for Reboot tweets on Twitter this week and next. Follow Twitter #agentrb.
